mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pro_item WHERE pro_code = #{pro_code} AND item_code = #{item_code}
mapper.select: SELECT item_code , item_name , CASE WHEN item_condition = '0' THEN '옵션없음' WHEN item_condition = '1' THEN '주관식' ELSE '객관식' END AS item_condition , REPLACE(item_option, '/', ' ') AS item_option FROM pro_item WHERE pro_code = #{pro_code}

SELECT item_code , item_name , CASE WHEN item_condition = '0' THEN '옵션없음' WHEN item_condition = '1' THEN '주관식' ELSE '객관식' END AS item_condition , REPLACE(item_option, '/', ' ') AS item_option FROM pro_item WHERE pro_code = #{pro_code} AND item_name = #{item_name} AND item_condition = #{item_condition}

SELECT reward_code , reward_item_name , reward_explan , CASE WHEN reward_isCount = 'N' THEN '수량제한 없음' ELSE concat(reward_count, '개') END AS reward_count , reward_amount FROM pro_reward WHERE pro_code = #{pro_code}
